page.title: 06TOURISM ACCOMMODATION
page.content: IN NARBERTH WE HAVE THREE HOTELS,THEY ARE PLAS HYFRYD,THE ANGEL HOTEL AND THE WELSH KITCHEN.THERE ARE FOUR CARAVAN PARKS AND A LARGE NUMBER OF GUEST HOUSES.THE FOUR CARAVAN PARKS ARE SITUATED ONE AT NOBLE COURT,ONE AT THE DINGLE,ONE DOWN BY THE BRIDGE WHICH IS OWNED BY WILLIE BEYNON AND THERE IS ALSO ONE AT ALLANS BANK WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE ROAD TO TEMPELTON. THE PLAS HYFRYD COUNTRY HOTEL(BEAUT_ IFUL PLACE IN ENGLISH)IS SITUATED ON MOOR FIELD ROAD.IT IS A LICENSED HOTEL WHICH HAS BEEN CAREFULLY RESTORED WITH FULL CENTRAL HEATING AND ALL TWELVE ROOMS HAVE THEIR OWN BATHROOM.IT HAS AN OUTDOOR HEATED SWIMMING POOL,A SPRING DIVING BOARD AND A SLIDE INTO THE WATER.IT HAS ALSO GOT A PADDLING POOL.THE ANGEL HOTEL IS SITUATED IN HIGH STREET.IT IS A LICENSED BAR,RESTAURANT AND HOTEL.
